name: Joneser.github.io
body:
### Overview
I am a software developer with a specialisation in UI development, mainly web (HTML5/CSS3/JS) and Java (both Android applications and J2EE). I incorporate strong quality practices in my work such as unit testing and a focus on performance.

### Work and Education History
I attended University College Dublin, completing an Honours Degree with a 2.1 final result and an A+ in my dissertation. Upon graduation, I began working at SAP Business Objects Ltd. as a developer, and have since become a Senior UI Developer with my specialties being Javascript, CSS3, Maven, continuous integration and test automation.

For full details, visit my LinkedIn profile at http://www.linkedin.com/in/davidjonesdev

### Questions and Contact Information
For any questions related to my github projects, or if you wish to contact me, please use one of the following:

Email: joneser88@msn.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Joneser88
LinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/in/davidjonesdev
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
